  function trackOutboundLink(url) {
    ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {hitCallback: function () {
      window.location.href = url;
    }});
  }

       <a class="btn btn-twitter" data-dst="true" data-href="http://aplus.com/a/this-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters" data-track-share="twitter" href="https://twitter.com/share?url=http%3A%2F%2Faplus.com%2Fa%2Fthis-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters&amp;text=This%20Plus-Sized%20Model%20Has%20A%20Message%20For%20Haters%20via%20%40aplusapp" onclick="javascript:popupShareWindow(this, 800, 400);return false;" target="_blank">

        </i>
       </a>
       <a class="btn btn-pinterest" data-dst="true" data-href="http://aplus.com/a/this-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters" data-share-media="//images5.aplus.com/uc-up/0e84e28f-871a-4b2b-b6fd-55acc94dea8d/Loeylane.crop_665x349_0,12.resize_1200x630.jpg" data-track-share="pinterest" href="https://www.pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http://aplus.com/a/this-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters&amp;description=This%20Plus-Sized%20Model%20Has%20A%20Message%20For%20Haters" onclick="javascript:popupShareWindow(this, 800, 400);return false;" target="_blank">
        <i class="fa fa-pinterest">
        </i>
       </a>
       <a class="btn btn-gplus" data-dst="true" data-href="http://aplus.com/a/this-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters" data-track-share="gplus" href="https://plus.google.com/share?url=http://aplus.com/a/this-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters" onclick="javascript:popupShareWindow(this, 600, 600);return false;" target="_blank">

  <main class="main">
   <div class="container">
    <div class="leaderboard-ad-area">
     <div class="google-ad-tag-container " id="div-gpt-ad-1403298890989-2">
      <script data-dfp="" type="text/javascript">
       //&lt;![CDATA[

//]]&gt;
      </script>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div class="content-container">
    <div id="div-gpt-ad-1435869289965-0">
     <script type="text/javascript">
      googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1435869289965-0'); });
     </script>
    </div>
    <div class="container">
     <div class="article-header">
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-sm-10">
        <h1 class="article-headline" itemprop="headline">
         This Plus-Sized Model Has A Message For Haters
        </h1>
        <p class="preview-text">
         "Remember that there is nothing wrong with you or your body."
        </p>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="row">
      <div class="gcs_inactive_wrapper" style="">
       <div class="col-sm-2 col-lg-2 article-byline-col">
        <div class="article-byline-comments">
         <div class="row">
          <div class="article-byline">
           <div class="author-photo">
            <span class="author-image" style="background-image:url(//images5.aplus.com/uc-up/34a1c391-eb58-4b50-8900-16547ce19092/34a1c391-eb58-4b50-8900-16547ce19092.crop_354x355_0,6.preview.format_jpeg.inline_yes.jpg);">
            </span>
           </div>
           <div class="author-info">
            <span class="author">
             <a class="name" href="/u/KSAPlus" rel="author">
              K.S. Anthony
             </a>
            </span>
            <span class="author-social">
             <i class="fa fa-twitter">
             </i>
             <a class="author-social-sn" href="https://twitter.com/APlus_KSA" target="_blank">
              @APlus_KSA
             </a>
            </span>
            <time class="timestamp" content="2014-10-28T10:55:00-07:00" datetime="28 Oct 10:55" itemprop="datePublished">
             Oct 28, 2014
            </time>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="comments-count">
           <div class="comments-count">
            <i class="fa fa-comment">
            </i>
            <span class="count">
             <fb:comments-count href="https://aplus.com/a/this-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters">
             </fb:comments-count>
            </span>
            <span class="hidden-xs">
             comments
            </span>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="article-category-container">
           <span class="article-category-name" itemprop="about">
            <div itemscope="" itemtype="http://data-vocabulary.org/Breadcrumb" style="display:inline;" title="lifestyle">
             <a class="category-Lifestyle" href="/c/lifestyle" itemprop="url">
              <span itemprop="title">
               lifestyle
              </span>
             </a>
            </div>
           </span>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article-ad-byline-logo">
         <div class="article-byline-logo" id="div-gpt-ad-1433433838832-0" tag_class="article-byline-logo">
          <script data-dfp="" type="text/javascript">
           //&lt;![CDATA[
window.rtp_queue.push(['display', 'div-gpt-ad-1433433838832-0']);
//]]&gt;
          </script>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="col-sm-7 col-lg-7 article-content-col">
        <div class="article-photo">
         <img alt="This Plus-Sized Model Has A Message For Haters" class="article-image" src="//images5.aplus.com/uc-up/0e84e28f-871a-4b2b-b6fd-55acc94dea8d/Loeylane.crop_665x349_0,12.resize_1200x630.jpg"/>
        </div>
        <div class="article-content desktop-article freeform" itemprop="articleBody">
         <div class="hold">
          <div class="block-wrapper text-block-wrapper">
           <p>
            YouTuber and plus-size model
            <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d_kcIUVPsDw">
             Loey Lane
            </a>
            recently posted this video of some swimsuit ideas. What's most striking about the video is the monologue she wrote in the description below it.
           </p>
           <p>
            In a preface to it, she writes:
            <br/>
            <br/>
           </p>
           <blockquote>
            I didn't want this to be just another fashion video; I wanted it to be a lot more. The monologue is based on something I wrote in an Instagram post earlier this month, and I'll type the full thing out down below. Post it on Tumblr, write it down and put it on your wall or just keep it in your head; but remember these words. Remember that there is nothing wrong with you or your body. I love all of you more than you know.
           </blockquote>
           <p>
            They're words that are worth sharing.
           </p>
           <p>
            <br/>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="google-ad-tag-before-image">
          <div class="google-ad-tag-container multiple-ad-container">
           <div class="" id="div-gpt-ad-1403298890989-0">
            <script data-dfp="" type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
window.rtp_queue.push(['display', 'div-gpt-ad-1403298890989-0']);
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </div>
           <div class="" id="div-gpt-ad-1413842932191-0">
            <script data-dfp="" type="text/javascript">
             //&lt;![CDATA[
window.rtp_queue.push(['display', 'div-gpt-ad-1413842932191-0']);
//]]&gt;
            </script>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="hold">
          <div class="embed-block-wrapper block-wrapper">
           <div class="preload-img yt-vid" data-params="wmode=transparent&amp;enablejsapi=1&amp;autohide=1&amp;playsinline=1&amp;modestbranding=1&amp;showinfo=0&amp;controls=2&amp;color=white&amp;origin=" data-videoid="d_kcIUVPsDw" id="yt-v-11623" style="width:100%;">
           </div>
           <div class="hold">
            <div class="video-block-wrapper block-wrapper">
             <div class="block-video-wrapper">
              <div class="ap-video-disabled" data-article-id="2292" data-article-link="http://aplus.com/a/this-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters" data-embed-code='&lt;script class="ap-embed" data-height="315" data-width="560" data-type="video" data-id="157" src="http://aplus.com/embed/code"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
' data-vast-uri="http://pubads.g.doubleclick.net/gampad/ads?sz=640x480&amp;iu=/31513280/aplus_desktop_video_player&amp;impl=s&amp;gdfp_req=1&amp;env=vp&amp;output=xml_vast3&amp;url=http://aplus.com&amp;description_url=http://aplus.com/a/this-plus-sized-model-has-a-message-for-haters&amp;unviewed_position_start=1&amp;correlator=" id="video_157">
              </div>
             </div>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="hold">
          <div class="block-wrapper text-block-wrapper">
           <p>
            <strong>
             <em>
              This is my body.
              <br/>
             </em>
            </strong>
           </p>
           <p>
            <em>
             This is the body of someone who has struggled with an eating disorder. This body is misunderstood. When people see it they assume I sit on the couch and eat McDonald's all day, when in reality Ive never even seen a Big Mac in person.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </em>
            <strong>
             They tell me its wrong.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </strong>
            <em>
             Its not okay to be fat, theyll say.
             <br/>
             <br/>
             You need to be healthy. Lose some weight. But then when they see me at the gym, they whisper and giggle just loudly enough for me to hear. Im a joke, something to be put in a hole until Im pretty by the standards of society.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </em>
            <strong>
             But before you tell me whats wrong with this body, let me tell you whats right.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </strong>
            <em>
             This body can run for miles and not give out on me.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </em>
            <strong>
             This body is strong. This body has curves.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </strong>
            <em>
             It has muscle and it has cellulite. This body is fueled with healthy foods, but doesn't fail if I feed it improperly from time to time. This is the body of a size 14, the average size of the American woman. And it should be represented the way it is: beautiful.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </em>
            <strong>
             This is the only body I will have for the rest of my life.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </strong>
            <em>
             It shows my struggles and it shows my progress. Why shouldn't I be proud of it? Why shouldn't it be celebrated? Why shouldnt the path to health be every bit as beautiful as the finished result? I am thankful for what this body has done for me. I am thankful for the healthy path I have taken, both mentally and physically.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </em>
            <strong>
             I am proud of what I've overcome.
             <br/>
             <br/>
             This is my body.
             <br/>
             <br/>
            </strong>
            Truer words never spoken.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            <strong>
             Please share this with your friends.
            </strong>
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="article-bottom-section">

         <div class="desktop taboola-widgets-container">
          <div class="ap-taboola-widget" id="taboola-below-article-1-thumbnails">
           <script>
            window._tbtags = window._tbtags || [];
  window._tbtags.push({
    mode: "thumbnails-c",
    container: "taboola-below-article-1-thumbnails",
    placement: "Below Article 1 Thumbnails",
    target_type: 'mix'
  });
           </script>
          </div>
         </div>
         <script>
          ;(function (w, d) {
  
    function _renderAbl(abId) {
      var html = '&lt;div id="adblade-container" class="';
      html += (__.isMobileDevice() ? 'mobile' : 'desktop' ) + '"&gt;';
      html += '&lt;ins class="adbladeads" data-cid="'+ abId + '"';
      html += ' data-host="web.adblade.com" data-tag-type="2"'
      html += ' style="display:none"&gt;&lt;/ins&gt;';
      html += '&lt;/div&gt;';
      return html;
    }
  
    var isMobile = __.isMobileDevice(),
        ccM = d.getElementsByClassName('mobile-latest-container'),
        ccD = d.getElementsByClassName('article-recommended'),
        audiences = __.getAudiences(),
        kx = '\u006C\u0069\u006C\u0077\u0061\u0079\u006E\u0065';
  
  
    if (isMobile) {
      __.rr.yieldmo();
    } else if (audiences.length &gt; 0) {
      __.rr.lockerdome();
    }
  
    function _renderLW() {
      if (isMobile) {
        var container = ccM[0];
        container.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', _renderAbl("12148-3773095598"));
        __.rr.adblade();
      } else {
        var container = ccD[0];
        container.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', _renderAbl("12147-1103762154"));
        __.rr.adblade();
      }
    }
  
    if (isMobile &amp;&amp; audiences.length) {
      __.rr.gumgum();
    }
  
    if (audiences.indexOf(kx) !== -1 || audiences.indexOf('111') !== -1) {
      _renderLW();
    } else if (!__.isSlideshow()) {
      var con = (isMobile ? ccM : ccD)[0];
      __.rr.taboola();
    }
  
  }(window, document));
         </script>
         <div class="article-facepile">
          <div class="row">
           <div class="col-xs-6">
            <fb:like-box colorscheme="light" header="true" height="290" href="https://www.facebook.com/aplusapp" show_border="false" show_faces="true" stream="false">
            </fb:like-box>
           </div>
           <div class="col-xs-6">
            <div class="google-ad-tag-container " id="div-gpt-ad-1408739759138-0">
             <script data-dfp="" type="text/javascript">
              //&lt;![CDATA[

//]]&gt;
             </script>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

      <div class="footer-aplus-brand">
       <a class="aplus-name-container footer-aplus-logo-area" href="/?ref=logo">
        <svg class="white-fg home-logo footer-logo aplus-logo" id="aplus-logo" viewbox="0 0 450.8 291.5" width="100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
         <path d="M146.3 35.7c-.8-.8-2.1-.8-2.8 0L31.8 147.4c-.8.8-1.4 2.3-1.4 3.4v110.5c0 1.1.6 1.4 1.4.6l111.7-111.7c.8-.8 2.1-.8 2.8 0L258.1 262c.8.8 1.4.5 1.4-.6V150.8c0-1.1-.6-2.6-1.4-3.4L146.3 35.7zM342.9 91.8h34.6v129.7h-34.6z">

        <div class="aplus-name">
         <h1>
          A Plus
         </h1>
         <small>
          Positive Journalism
         </small>
        </div>
       </a>
       <div class="footer-aplus-mission">
        <p>
         A Plus is a digital media company co-founded by Ashton Kutcher that features stories that make a difference and create positive change. Were built from the ground up for the social age. In less than a year weve reached an audience of approximately 50 million monthly visitors by highlighting social issues, sharing breaking news, and creating original, entertaining content.
        </p>
       </div>

     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </footer>

   ;(function (u){
  u.getScript('//js.honeybadger.io/v0.2/honeybadger.min.js', function () {
    if (!window.Honeybadger) return;
    Honeybadger.configure({
      api_key: 'f9e94267',
      environment: 'production'
    });
    window.Bugsnag = {
      notify: function (e) {
        Honeybadger.notify(e);
      },
      notifyException: function (e) {
        Honeybadger.notifyException(e);
      }
    };
  });
}(window.__));
  </script>

   (function () {
  var d = new Image(1, 1);
  d.onerror = d.onload = function () {
  d.onerror = d.onload = null;
  };
  d.src = ["//secure-us.imrworldwide.com/cgi-bin/m?ci=us-806958h&amp;cg=0&amp;cc=1&amp;si=", escape(window.location.href), "&amp;rp=", escape(document.referrer), "&amp;ts=compact&amp;rnd=", (new Date()).getTime()].join('');

  <script>
   FACEBOOK_APP_ID = '538951249478848';
  window.fbAsyncInit = function() {
    // init the FB JS SDK
    FB.init({
    appId      : FACEBOOK_APP_ID,
    status     : true, // check the login status upon init?
    cookie     : true, // set sessions cookies to allow your server to access the session?
    xfbml      : true,  // parse XFBML tags on this page?
    frictionlessRequests : true
    });

    var cev = (window.initCustomEvent != null) ? window.initCustomEvent : function (name) {
      return new CustomEvent(name, {bubbles: true});
    };
    window.document.dispatchEvent(cev('fbinit', true, false))
  };

  (function(d, s, id){
  var js, fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];
  if (d.getElementById(id)) {return;}
  js = d.createElement(s); js.id = id;
  js.src = "//connect.facebook.net/en_US/all.js";
  fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);
  }(document, 'script', 'facebook-jssdk'));
  </script>

  <script>
   (function() {
    var pageVariations, _noop;
  
    console.log('slider initializing experiemnt');
  
    _noop = (function() {});
  
    pageVariations = [function() {}, function() {}];
  
    (pageVariations[window.chosenVariation] || _noop)();
  
  }).call(this);
